Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity near Sox-35th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity near Sox-35th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
